UI Components

Vista provides a comprehensive library of pre-built UI components for building modern user interfaces.

Component Categories

  • Text Components - Labels, titles, subtitles

  • Button Controls - Buttons and key buttons

  • Input Fields - Text inputs, textareas, selects

  • Selection Controls - Checkboxes, toggles, radio groups

  • Sliders & Choice - Sliders, rotary, drop lists

  • Containers - Boxes, panels, groups

  • Layout Containers - Rows, columns, grids

  • Navigation - Tabs, toolbar, menubar

  • Data Display - Lists, tables

  • Visual Dividers - Dividers, spacers, splits

  • Canvas - Canvas elements

Basic Usage

view .html [ text "Hello, World!" button "Click Me" [print "Clicked!"] field "Enter text..." [] checkbox "Accept terms" [] ]
